messages.content: Tom Morrison is fighting to give Cheadle Constituency a better deal. His priorities for Cheadle are more school funding, an end to local NHS cuts and more action on damaging climate change. A resident in Cheadle, Tom is a local councillor and school governor. He understands the issues facing our community and local people.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Tom Morrison's priorities for Cheadle include more school funding.
Tom has campaigned for more police on our streets and supported local residents and businesses when they have been affected by crime.
Tom Morrison aims to end local NHS cuts and protect the NHS.

mentions.otherPartyLeaderCandidate: Just another Conservative, Cutting services to the bone, Voting for damaging Brexit
mentions.tacticalSituation: Everyone knows, Labour can't win in Cheadle

issues.education: Reverse the school cuts, His priorities for Cheadle are more school funding
issues.environment: more action on damaging climate change
issues.health: end to local NHS cuts, He will protect our NHS
